item.title: Has Canara Robeco declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Canara Robeco has declared a 15% dividend, with an ex-date of December 22, 2025. While specific total return figures for different periods were not provided, the dividend reflects the company's commitment to enhancing shareholder value. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: When is the next results date for Vidya Wires?
item.description: The next results date for Vidya Wires is 22 December 2025. Time: 38 minutes ago

item.title: What is the bonus history of A-1?
item.description: A-1's recent bonus history includes a 3:1 bonus announced on December 31, 2025, and a 3:20s bonus issued on August 19, 2021, with an ex-date of August 17, 2021. Time: 53 minutes ago

item.title: MAS FINANC SER Joins Market Coverage Backed by Strong Quarterly Financials
item.description: MAS FINANC SER, a small-cap player in the Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, has been added to market coverage following a series of robust quarterly financial results. The company’s latest performance metrics highlight significant operational scale and profitability, positioning it as a noteworthy contender within the NBFC space. Time: 3 hours ago

item.title: SG Finserve Joins MomentumNow Stocks Amid Strong Quarterly Financials
item.description: SG Finserve, a small-cap Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC), has been added to the MomentumNow Stocks list as of 18 December 2025, reflecting its notable financial performance in the September 2025 quarter. The company’s recent quarterly results highlight significant growth across key metrics, positioning it as a compelling candidate for investors seeking momentum-driven opportunities in the NBFC sector. Time: 3 hours ago

item.title: IFCI Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: IFCI Ltd., a key player in the finance sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting potential long-term weakness and a deterioration in price momentum. Time: 5 hours ago
